content: this pattern is the culmination of years of sock knitting experimenting with gauge yarn and fit that sounds rather grand doesn t it a person can get mightily excited when they finally stumble across the perfect synergy of heel toe and fabric this is the sock construction that fits my paddle shaped feet best it has a square or dutch heel turn to accommodate my narrow heel and high instep and a swirl toe that fits my wide round toe box perfectly i hope you enjoy it sizes xs s m l xl xxl approximate uk shoe size 3 5 6 7 5 9 5 11 approximate us shoe size 5 7 8 9 5 11 5 13 yarn requirements 100g of 4 ply fingering weight yarn skills knit purl picking up stitches slipped stitches kitchener stitch simple decreases this pattern is also part of my simple socks 1 collection 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/louleighs-simple-socks
